mapper.sql: id as id, tn_id as tnId, course_id as courseId, teacher_id as teacherId, important_type as importantType, week_type as weekType, create_date as createDate, task_id as taskId
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO saas_jw_base_week_rule ( tn_id, course_id, teacher_id, important_type, week_type, create_date, task_id ) VALUES ( #{tnId}, #{courseId}, #{teacherId}, #{importantType}, #{weekType}, #{createDate}, #{taskId} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE saas_jw_base_week_rule
tn_id = #{tnId},
course_id = #{courseId},
teacher_id = #{teacherId},
important_type = #{importantType},
week_type = #{weekType},
create_date = #{createDate},
task_id = #{taskId},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE saas_jw_base_week_rule
tn_id = #{map.tnId},
course_id = #{map.courseId},
teacher_id = #{map.teacherId},
important_type = #{map.importantType},
week_type = #{map.weekType},
create_date = #{map.createDate},
task_id = #{map.taskId},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO saas_jw_base_week_rule ( tn_id, course_id, teacher_id, important_type, week_type, create_date, task_id ) VALUES ( #{map.tnId}, #{map.courseId}, #{map.teacherId}, #{map.importantType}, #{map.weekType}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.taskId} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM saas_jw_base_week_rule
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND tn_id like CONCAT('%', #{tnId} , '%')
AND course_id like CONCAT('%', #{courseId} , '%')
AND teacher_id like CONCAT('%', #{teacherId} , '%')
AND important_type like CONCAT('%', #{importantType} , '%')
AND week_type like CONCAT('%', #{weekType} , '%')
AND create_date like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND task_id like CONCAT('%', #{taskId} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
